data.text:
The middle of Summer Camp. Mejiro Ardan was in good physical 
condition, and training was proceeding favorably. Then one day―
data.processed:
<story>The middle of Summer Camp. Mejiro Ardan was in good physical 
<story>condition, and training was proceeding favorably. Then one day―

data.text:
And with that, I look forward to this afternoon. 
 
…Oh?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>And with that, I look forward to this afternoon. 
<story> 
<story>…Oh?

data.text:
Ah, you two over there! Are you free tonight? We're planning 
a test of courage tonight, so we're looking for participants!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Ah, you two over there! Are you free tonight? We're planning 
<story>a test of courage tonight, so we're looking for participants!

data.text:
Oh, a test of courage? I've heard about them, but I've never 
really had a chance to participate before.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Oh, a test of courage? I've heard about them, but I've never 
<story>really had a chance to participate before.

data.text:
Hey, wait a second! If you ask her so suddenly, it'll trouble 
her you know? I mean… Ardan-senpai, probably wants to take 
care of her physical condition…!
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>Hey, wait a second! If you ask her so suddenly, it'll trouble 
<story>her you know? I mean… Ardan-senpai, probably wants to take 
<story>care of her physical condition…!

data.text:
Oh… thank you for your consideration. There aren't any problems 
with my physical condition but… let's see…
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Oh… thank you for your consideration. There aren't any problems 
<story>with my physical condition but… let's see…

data.text:
It looks like Mejiro Ardan wants to participate but she doesn't 
want anyone to worry about her. If that's the case―

choices.text: Let's join. I'll be with you so it'll be okay
choices.processed: <size=41>Let's join. I'll be with you so it'll be okay</size>

choices.text: Let's join. I'll be with you so it'll be okay
choices.processed: <size=41>Let's join. I'll be with you so it'll be okay</size>

data.processed:
<story>It looks like Mejiro Ardan wants to participate but she doesn't 
<story>want anyone to worry about her. If that's the case―

data.text:
!! 
 
Trainer-san…
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>!! 
<story> 
<story>Trainer-san…

data.text:
Got it! But, make sure to take it easy, okay? 
If you need to leave part way through, that's fine!
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>Got it! But, make sure to take it easy, okay? 
<story>If you need to leave part way through, that's fine!

data.text: And so, we decided to participate in the test of courage, but―
data.processed: <story>And so, we decided to participate in the test of courage, but―

data.text: Boooooo～～～!!!!
data.name: Ghost Role Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>Boooooo～～～!!!!

data.text:
KYAAAAA―――!!!! 
 
IYAAAA～～～～～!!!!
data.name: Participants Ahead
data.processed:
<story>KYAAAAA―――!!!! 
<story> 
<story>IYAAAA～～～～～!!!!

data.text: We could hear loud screams coming from ahead in the darkness
data.processed: <story>We could hear loud screams coming from ahead in the darkness

data.text:
It really does… Fufuu, to say nothing of the excitement. 
Well then, shall we head off too?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>It really does… Fufuu, to say nothing of the excitement. 
<story>Well then, shall we head off too?

data.text:
Booooo～～～～!!!! ……Oh, Ardan-senpai?! 
S-sorry, are you okay?!
data.name: Ghost Role Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Booooo～～～～!!!! ……Oh, Ardan-senpai?! 
<story>S-sorry, are you okay?!

data.text: Yes, there are no problems. Thank you for being so conscientious.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Yes, there are no problems. Thank you for being so conscientious.

data.text:
I'm～…… gonna～…… curse～… you～…… 
……Senpai～ , please watch your step～.
data.name: Ghost Role Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>I'm～…… gonna～…… curse～… you～…… 
<story>……Senpai～ , please watch your step～.

data.text:
Thank you very much. 
You too, be careful of getting bitten by any insects.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Thank you very much. 
<story>You too, be careful of getting bitten by any insects.

data.text:
It's good they're worried about Mejiro Ardan's condition but, they're 
not really playing their part as a ghost. Like this, I'm wondering 
if she's enjoying it but―
data.processed:
<story>It's good they're worried about Mejiro Ardan's condition but, they're 
<story>not really playing their part as a ghost. Like this, I'm wondering 
<story>if she's enjoying it but―

data.text:
Fufuu… tests of courage, are really interesting, aren't they? 
Everyone's so lively, I'm glad they invited me.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: You look like you're having fun too
You look like you're having fun too

data.processed:
<story>Fufuu… tests of courage, are really interesting, aren't they? 
<story>Everyone's so lively, I'm glad they invited me.

data.text: Yes, I'm thrilled. After all―
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Yes, I'm thrilled. After all―

data.text:
Following a dark path as a pair…… trying to find ghosts. 
It's much like that play we saw together a little while ago.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Following a dark path as a pair…… trying to find ghosts. 
<story>It's much like that play we saw together a little while ago.

data.text:
Look there, friend. Surely that, is the cursed castle that only 
appears at night! How imposing it seems…
data.name: Knight A
data.processed:
<story>Look there, friend. Surely that, is the cursed castle that only 
<story>appears at night! How imposing it seems…

data.text: A g-g-g-ghost?!
data.name: The 2 Knights
data.processed: <story>A g-g-g-ghost?!

data.text:
Maybe it's because it's dark, but when I think back, it was 
supposed to be a comedy but, it seemed to suddenly head 
in an ominous direction…

choices.text: I-I'm starting to get a little nervous. Maybe…
choices.processed: <size=37>I-I'm starting to get a little nervous. Maybe…</size>

data.processed:
<story>Maybe it's because it's dark, but when I think back, it was 
<story>supposed to be a comedy but, it seemed to suddenly head 
<story>in an ominous direction…

data.text:
…But, there was no response to those words. Mejiro Ardan, 
who was supposed to be next to me, was nowhere to be seen.
data.processed:
<story>…But, there was no response to those words. Mejiro Ardan, 
<story>who was supposed to be next to me, was nowhere to be seen.

data.text: I started walking quickly while looking around, but couldn't find her―
data.processed: <story>I started walking quickly while looking around, but couldn't find her―

data.text: -Waaa!!!!
data.processed: <story>-Waaa!!!!

data.text: Oh……! Fufuu, fufufufu, what a loud cry.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Oh……! Fufuu, fufufufu, what a loud cry.

data.text:
Fuu… I apologize for that. While we were talking, I thought it 
would be fun to try being the ghost… so I couldn't help myself.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: Next time, I'll be the one to scare you!
choices.processed: <size=43>Next time, I'll be the one to scare you!</size>

choices.text: Next time, I'll be the one to scare you!
choices.processed: <size=43>Next time, I'll be the one to scare you!</size>

data.processed:
<story>Fuu… I apologize for that. While we were talking, I thought it 
<story>would be fun to try being the ghost… so I couldn't help myself.

data.text: Oh my, then I look forward to seeing what you can do～
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Oh my, then I look forward to seeing what you can do～

data.text:
That was a very worthwhile event, wasn't it? 
It's unfortunate we couldn't find any ghosts or that castle though.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>That was a very worthwhile event, wasn't it? 
<story>It's unfortunate we couldn't find any ghosts or that castle though.

data.text:
Fufuu. Things like hiding and letting out a loud voice, 
it was fun seeing all the things you thought of.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu. Things like hiding and letting out a loud voice, 
<story>it was fun seeing all the things you thought of.

data.text:
Returning to childhood… maybe that's the kind of thing 
they're talking about. When I'm with Trainer-san, it feels 
like I can relax a bit easier.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Returning to childhood… maybe that's the kind of thing 
<story>they're talking about. When I'm with Trainer-san, it feels 
<story>like I can relax a bit easier.

data.text: Fuu…
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: If you're tired, we can take a break.

data.processed: <story>Fuu…

data.text: I'm fine, I'm not very tired―
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>I'm fine, I'm not very tired―

data.text:
…… 
 
No, maybe it would be fine to take a little break, right?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>…… 
<story> 
<story>No, maybe it would be fine to take a little break, right?

data.text:
There's training tomorrow after all… what should we do about 
the menu? Today it seems like we're staying up a bit late…
data.name: Mejiro Ardan

choices.text: Tomorrow, I plan to have you train hard.
choices.processed: <size=41>Tomorrow, I plan to have you train hard.</size>

data.processed:
<story>There's training tomorrow after all… what should we do about 
<story>the menu? Today it seems like we're staying up a bit late…

data.text: ……! Okay, I understand.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>……! Okay, I understand.

data.text: Fufuu, yes. Probably more so than Trainer-san thinks.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, yes. Probably more so than Trainer-san thinks.

data.text:
You've accepted that I want to do all that I can. 
…There's someone who understands me.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>You've accepted that I want to do all that I can. 
<story>…There's someone who understands me.

data.text: You have no idea how reassuring that is. That's why, I―
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>You have no idea how reassuring that is. That's why, I―

data.text:
…Trainer-san, do you remember? 
Before, how you said that it was fine if I wanted to be pampered?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>…Trainer-san, do you remember? 
<story>Before, how you said that it was fine if I wanted to be pampered?

data.text:
Trainer-san, I'll promise not to push myself too hard when 
you're around, so please, rest assured.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, I'll promise not to push myself too hard when 
<story>you're around, so please, rest assured.

data.text: Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know.
data.processed: <story>Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know.

data.text: Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know.
data.processed: <story>Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know.

data.text:
Trainer-san, you said when I was with you, I could relax 
a bit more, didn't you?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, you said when I was with you, I could relax 
<story>a bit more, didn't you?

data.text:
Then… could I borrow your shoulder for a bit… 
For some reason, the sound of the waves is very calming―
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Then… could I borrow your shoulder for a bit… 
<story>For some reason, the sound of the waves is very calming―

data.text: A gentle sound… I might fall asleep just like this… …Yes, it would probably be fine even if I did.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: A gentle sound… I might fall asleep just like this… …Yes, it would probably be fine even if I did.

data.text: Looking at "the Me, right now", this must be… the place… I want to be.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: Looking at "the Me, right now", this must be… the place… I want to be.
